extension.description: Connect your Kodi installation to an Audiobookshelf server and stream audiobooks and podcasts directly within Kodi. Supports M4B files, multi-file audiobooks, and podcasts with full progress sync.
extension.news:
v0.1.0 (2025-12-08) - FIXED: Settings now appear correctly (using legacy XML format) - FIXED: Empty podcasts handled gracefully - FIXED: Episodes not on server now show [Not on Server] prefix - FIXED: Progress syncs to server when closing audiobook/podcast - REMOVED: "Play from Beginning" option (just click first chapter) - NEW: Sync settings page with options for audiobooks and podcasts - NEW: Conflict resolution when local and server progress differ - NEW: Option to use server position, local position, furthest, or ask - NEW: Configurable sync intervals (10s, 15s, 30s, 60s) - NEW: Option to disable server sync entirely - NEW: Offline progress saving with sync on reconnect - IMPROVED: Resume button shows current chapter name
v0.0.5 (2025-12-08) - Fixed chapter/resume playback calculation - Added multi-file audiobook downloads - Added podcast metadata from RSS feeds - Added "Download to Server" for podcast episodes
v0.0.4 (2025-12-07) - Added download functionality - Added offline playback support - Fixed Kodi 21 deprecation warnings
